description:
As a development team
  We want automated test execution before commits and pushes
  So that code quality gates are enforced at the source control level

elements.name: Successful commit with passing tests

steps.name: the pre-commit hook executes the test suite

elements.name: Blocked commit due to failing tests

steps.name: the test suite contains failing tests
the pre-commit hook executes the test suite

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Commit should be rejected
    + expected - actual

    -false
    +true

    at CustomWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/nimrodbeithalachmi/nimiSource/monday-band/specs/git-hooks-test-enforcement/step_definitions/git_hooks_steps.js:111:3)

steps.name: the developer receives clear failure feedback

elements.name: Blocked commit with partial test failures

steps.name: some tests pass while others fail
the pre-commit hook executes the test suite
the hook treats partial failure as complete failure

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Partial failure should reject commit
    + expected - actual

    -false
    +true

    at CustomWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/nimrodbeithalachmi/nimiSource/monday-band/specs/git-hooks-test-enforcement/step_definitions/git_hooks_steps.js:120:3)

elements.name: Commit with override bypasses tests

steps.name: the developer commits with the no-verify option
the commit is created without running tests

elements.name: Commit attempt with no staged changes

steps.name: the developer has no staged changes
the commit is rejected by git before the hook runs

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Should be a "no changes" error
    + expected - actual

    -false
    +true

    at CustomWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/nimrodbeithalachmi/nimiSource/monday-band/specs/git-hooks-test-enforcement/step_definitions/git_hooks_steps.js:136:3)

elements.name: Hook execution exceeds reasonable time threshold

steps.name: the test suite execution is abnormally slow
the pre-commit hook provides progress feedback

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Should show progress
    + expected - actual

    -false
    +true

    at CustomWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/nimrodbeithalachmi/nimiSource/monday-band/specs/git-hooks-test-enforcement/step_definitions/git_hooks_steps.js:142:3)

steps.name: the developer can interrupt the operation safely

elements.name: Successful push with passing tests

steps.name: the developer has commits ready to push
the pre-push hook executes the test suite

elements.name: Blocked push due to failing tests

steps.name: the developer has commits ready to push
the test suite contains failing tests
the pre-push hook executes the test suite

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Push should be rejected
    + expected - actual

    -false
    +true

    at CustomWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/nimrodbeithalachmi/nimiSource/monday-band/specs/git-hooks-test-enforcement/step_definitions/git_hooks_steps.js:218:3)

steps.name: the developer receives clear failure feedback

elements.name: Push with override bypasses tests

steps.name: the developer has commits ready to push
the developer pushes with the no-verify option
the push completes without running tests

elements.name: Push multiple commits with mixed test states

steps.name: the developer has multiple commits ready to push
the pre-push hook executes tests against the current codebase state
the hook evaluates the final state rather than individual commits

elements.name: Force push respects hook behavior

steps.name: the developer attempts a force push
the pre-push hook still executes unless overridden
test enforcement applies equally to force pushes

elements.name: Push fails due to remote issues after tests pass

steps.name: the developer has commits ready to push
the push encounters remote connection failure
the developer can distinguish between test failure and network failure
retry does not re-run tests unnecessarily

elements.name: Hooks are properly installed

steps.name: the developer installs the git hooks
the pre-commit hook is placed in the git hooks directory
the pre-push hook is placed in the git hooks directory
the hooks reference the correct test command

elements.name: Hook reinstallation updates existing hooks

steps.name: the developer reinstalls or updates the hooks
the existing hook files are replaced
the new hook configuration takes effect
no orphaned or duplicate hooks remain

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Should have exactly one pre-commit hook
    + expected - actual

    -false
    +true

    at CustomWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/nimrodbeithalachmi/nimiSource/monday-band/specs/git-hooks-test-enforcement/step_definitions/git_hooks_steps.js:345:3)

elements.name: Installation fails due to permission restrictions

steps.name: the hooks directory is not writable
the developer attempts to install hooks
the installation reports a permission error
provides guidance on resolving the issue

elements.name: Test framework unavailable during hook execution

steps.name: the test framework is not accessible
a git hook attempts to run tests
the hook reports the missing dependency clearly

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Should report missing command
    + expected - actual

    -false
    +true

    at CustomWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/nimrodbeithalachmi/nimiSource/monday-band/specs/git-hooks-test-enforcement/step_definitions/git_hooks_steps.js:398:3)

elements.name: Hooks directory contains conflicting files

steps.name: custom hook files already exist in the hooks directory
the developer installs the test enforcement hooks
prompts for merge or overwrite decision

elements.name: Zero tests in test suite

steps.name: the test suite contains no test cases
a hook executes the test suite
the hook behavior is clearly defined
the git operation is not silently allowed

elements.name: Hook execution is visible to the developer

steps.name: a git hook is executing tests
the developer sees real-time progress indication

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Should show progress message
    + expected - actual

    -false
    +true

    at CustomWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/nimrodbeithalachmi/nimiSource/monday-band/specs/git-hooks-test-enforcement/step_definitions/git_hooks_steps.js:480:3)

steps.name: can identify which hook is executing

elements.name: Hook bypass is detectable

steps.name: the developer uses the no-verify option
the bypass is logged or visible in git output
teams can audit override usage patterns

name: Git Hooks for Test Enforcement
